DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate Picosure Laser System treatment unwanted tattoo .
DOC.brief_title: Picosure Alexandrite Laser Treatment Unwanted Tattoos
DOC.criteria: 1 . Is healthy male female 18 85 year old . 2 . Is willing consent participate study . 3 . Is willing comply requirement study include photograph , follow post treatment care attend treatment follow visit . 4 . The tattoo must include red pigment . 1 . Is female pregnant , pregnant within last 3 month , currently breast feed plan pregnancy study period . 2 . Is hypersensitive light exposure OR take photo sensitized medication . 3 . Has active localize systemic infection . 4 . Has coagulation disorder currently use anticoagulation medication ( include limit heavy use aspirin { great 81 mg per day } ) . 5 . Has condition , investigator 's opinion , would make unsafe subject participate research study . 6 . Is currently enrol investigational drug device trial , receive investigational drug treat investigational device within 3 month prior enter study . 7 . Has use Accutane within 6 month prior enrollment . 8 . Has need expose artificial tanning device excessive sunlight trial . 9 . Has prior treatment parenteral gold therapy ( gold sodium thiomalate ) . 10 . Has history keloid . 11 . Has evidence compromise wound heal . 12 . Has history basal cell carcinoma , squamous cell carcinoma melanoma . 13 . Has history immunosuppression/immune deficiency disorder ( include HIV infection AIDS ) use immunosuppressive medication autoimmune disorder . 14 . Is allergic topical lidocaine topical steroid .
